code: import axios from"axios";import{API_URL}from"../constants";export var get100Coins=function get100Coins(){var coins=axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/markets?vs_currency=usd&order=market_cap_desc&per_page=100&page=1&sparkline=false")).then(function(response){if(response.status==200){return response.data;}}).catch(function(error){console.log("ERROR>>>",error);});if(coins)return coins;else return;};
